Heya

I hope it's okay if I make another "looking for" thread even if I already have one.

I'm looking for a mod (if there's any) with radial-attachable parts that increase torque. KW Rocketry has it's "rings" but I'm looking for something smaller. I saw that once, but fail to find it again now. Anybody have an idea?
No idea about mods, but you can radially mount them by radially mounting a cubic strut and attaching the stock wheels to them
Or you can edit what ever radial-attachable part that you have and make it do what you want.

Cacteye Orbital Telescope has surface mounted gyros. Note that you'll need to install the plugin from the mod as well -- it lets you toggle the amount of torque the gyros generate. Edited August 30, 2014 by somnambulist
